医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
美国有超过 100,000 名年轻人患有炎症性肠病美国 20 岁以下儿童的炎症性肠病患病率正在上升，受影响人数超过 100,000 人，这揭示了严重的公共卫生问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/More-than-100000-young-people-in-the-US-live-with-itis-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/More-than-100000-young-people-in-the-US-live-with-itis-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7503bbd5-5108-4de1-b503-a38cff48ab07 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 13:18:00 -0500 More than 100,000 young people in the US live with inflammatory bowel disease
有意识地减慢呼吸的大脑回路可以减少焦虑和负面情绪dACC→PnC 回路的研究结果表明呼吸模式如何影响焦虑，为新的情绪调节治疗方法铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Anxiety-and-negative-emotions-reduced-by-brain- Circuit-that-thoughtly-slows-breathing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Anxiety-and-negative-emotions-reduced-by-brain- Circuit-that-thoughtly-slows-breathing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3eed647-d0e3-4c1d-b08f-58e93c154755 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 12:56:00 -0500 Anxiety and negative emotions reduced by brain circuit that consciously slows breathing
新技术可快速检测人体内TNT代谢物近日，中国科学院合肥物质科学研究院黄超群研究员课题组创新性开发了双漂移管离子迁移谱（DDT-IMS）技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/New-technology-enables-rapid-detection-of-TNT-metabolites-in-the- human-body.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/New-technology-enables-rapid-detection-of-TNT-metabolites-in-the- human-body.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11b7f4d6-d3fb-40eb-b8a3-fa10d2ee9d42 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 09:45:26 -0500 New technology enables rapid detection of TNT metabolites in the human body
开发出用于检测高致病性H5N1禽流感病毒的先进诊断试剂盒诊断开发中心 (DxD Hub) 是一个国家平台，由新加坡科学技术研究局 (A*STAR) 与日本国家环境研究所 (NIES) 和 A*STAR 合作主办生物信息研究所（A*STAR BII）成功开发了Steadfast，一种用于检测高致病性H5N1禽流感病毒（AIV）的先进诊断试剂盒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Advanced-diagnostic-kit-development-for-detecting-highly-pathogenic-H5N1-avian-influenza-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Advanced-diagnostic-kit-development-for-detecting-highly-pathogenic-H5N1-avian-influenza-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34ca80f7-180d-4e79-9281-856f352a2936 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 09:13:53 -0500 Advanced diagnostic kit developed for detecting highly pathogenic H5N1 avian influenza virus
人工智能可以帮助解决尿路感染和抗菌素耐药性利物浦大学抗菌优化网络中心 (CAMO-Net) 的新研究表明，使用人工智能 (AI) 可以改善我们治疗尿路感染 (UTI) 的方式，并有助于解决抗菌素耐药性 (AMR)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/AI-can-help-tackle-urinary-tract-infections-and-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/AI-can-help-tackle-urinary-tract-infections-and-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aaff8ccd-11f4-47bf-878e-4964f4246949 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 09:10:59 -0500 AI can help tackle urinary tract infections and antimicrobial resistance
播客会影响健康行为吗？研究人员研究了播客对健康行为和结果、使用模式和个人看法的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Do-podcasts-influence-health-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Do-podcasts-influence-health-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e437a50-b94b-46b0-83cf-a214678365df Fri, 22 Nov 2024 08:59:00 -0500 Do podcasts influence health behaviors?
新研究揭示了胶质母细胞瘤为何对治疗产生耐药性加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心科学家的一项新研究有助于解释为什么胶质母细胞瘤（最具侵袭性的脑癌之一）会对治疗产生耐药性，并引入了一种新方法，为针对胶质母细胞瘤患者制定更个性化的治疗策略铺平了道路。这种致命的脑肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/New-study-unveils-why-glioblastoma-becomes-pressive-to-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/New-study-unveils-why-glioblastoma-becomes-pressive-to-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed58f950-76fd-4bb7-8386-feefad0987ac Fri, 22 Nov 2024 08:50:18 -0500 New study unveils why glioblastoma becomes resistant to treatment
青少年打鼾与问题行为有关，但与认知缺陷无关马里兰大学医学院研究人员进行的一项新研究表明，经常打鼾的青少年更容易出现注意力不集中、违反规则和攻击性等行为问题，但他们的认知能力并没有任何下降。 （UMSOM）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Snoring-in-adolescents-linked-with-problem-behaviors-but-not-cognitive-deficits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Snoring-in-adolescents-linked-with-problem-behaviors-but-not-cognitive-deficits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=151fbc9c-c521-424d-befd-7e30b61ead23 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 08:47:09 -0500 Snoring in adolescents linked with problem behaviors but not cognitive deficits
新显微镜技术可对完整小鼠大脑进行 3D RNA 分析卡罗林斯卡学院和卡罗林斯卡大学医院的研究人员开发了一种突破性的显微镜方法，能够在完整的小鼠大脑中以细胞分辨率进行详细的三维 (3D) RNA 分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/New-microscopy-technique-enables-3D-RNA-analysis-in-intact-mouse-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/New-microscopy-technique-enables-3D-RNA-analysis-in-intact-mouse-brains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd51003a-abe3-4d19-aa52-a52148c3d421 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 07:09:16 -0500 New microscopy technique enables 3D RNA analysis in intact mouse brains
尽管有联邦监督，格鲁吉亚残疾人仍被送入收容机构劳埃德·米尔斯厌倦了被困在狭小、单调的病房里。九月中旬一个下着雨的早晨，一堵几乎空白的白墙上挂着一台小电视，无声地播放着。空间里没有任何东西可以让它高兴起来——没有卡片，没有鲜花。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Georgians-with-disability-are-still-being-institutionalized-despite-federal-oversight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Georgians-with-disability-are-still-being-institutionalized-despite-federal-oversight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=482d5bd0-acc6-4074-b882-a3f8ad6b3f0a Fri, 22 Nov 2024 07:04:54 -0500 Georgians with disabilities are still being institutionalized, despite federal oversight
